programme.title: Live Test Cricket
programme.sub-title: England v South Africa: Third Test Day Five.
programme.desc: England v South Africa. Coverage of the fifth day of the Third Test in the four-match series, which is held at The Oval. The hosts have struggled on this ground in recent years, winning just two of their last seven Tests here, but will be determined to avoid another defeat after South Africa leveled the series at 1-1 following a dominant victory at Trent Bridge

programme.title: Live ATP Tennis
programme.desc: The Citi Open. Coverage of the second day's play at the William HG FitzGerald Tennis Centre in Washington, DC, where Gael Monfils won the title in 2016. The flamboyant Frenchman defeated big-serving Croatian Ivo Karlovic 5-7, 7-6, 6-4 in the final to claim his first ATP title since winning the 2014 Open Sud de France

ATP 500 Hamburg: Finale
programme.desc: Prvi teniški turnir v Hamburgu so organizirali že leta 1892 in je bil več let na sporedu maja, ko so se igralci pripravljali na Roland Garros, v zadnjem času pa je na sporedu sredi poletja. Pred letom dni je bil na igriščih centra Am Rothenbaum najboljši Martin Kilžan. Kdo bo letos dvignil pokal?

programme.title: Danska liga: Brondby - Lyngby
programme.desc: Danska Superliga je najvišje kotirano ligaško nogometno tekmovanje na Danskem. Ustanovljena je bila leta 1991 pod okriljem Danske nogometne zveze. Je naslednica t.i. Danske prve lige. V njej nastopa 12 klubov. Najuspešnejši klub je branilec naslova državnega prvaka FC Copenhagen, za katerega nastopa tudi Benjamin Verbič. Med zelo uspešne danske klube spadajo tudi Odense BK, AaB Aalborg in Brondby IF

programme.title: Car Fashion
programme.desc: Zanimiva oddaja o zadnjih novostih iz sveta avtomobilizma

programme.title: Avstrijska liga: Austria (D) - Sturm
programme.desc: Avstrijska Bundesliga je najvišje rangirano ligaško nogometno tekmovanje v Avstriji. Ustanovljena je bila daljnega leta 1911. V njej nastopa 10 klubov, ki med seboj odločajo o naslovu državnega prvaka. Daleč najuspešnejši klub je Rapid, ki je osvojil kar 32 naslovov, sledi mu Austria, ki jih je v svoje vitrine pospravila 24. Aktualni prvaki so nogometaši Salzburga(c)

programme.title: ATP 250 Atlanta - Finale: Harrison - Isner
programme.desc: Medtem ko nekateri igralci po Wimbledonu ostajajo v Evropi, kjer se bodo merili tudi v Hamburgu na peščeni podlagi, se drugi že selijo v ZDA, kjer bo potekala glavnina sezone na trdi podlagi. Eden od prvih turnirjev bo na sporedu v Atlanti, kjer je bil pred letom dni najboljši "slabi deček" Nick Kyrgios, ki bo letos poskušal ubraniti lovoriko(c)

programme.title: Švicarska liga: Basel - Luzern
programme.desc: Raiffeisen Super League je profesionalna nogometna liga v Švici. Ustanovljena je bila leta 1931. V njej nastopa 10 klubov. Igra se po štiri-krožnem sistemu (vsi udeleženci lige se med seboj udarijo štirikrat; dvakrat doma in dvakrat v gosteh). Tako po 36. odigranih krogih dobimo novega državnega prvaka. Iz lige izpade samo en klub. Aktualni prvaki so nogometaši Basla(g)

programme.title: Serbian League: Rad - Crvena zvezda
programme.desc: Crvena zvezda je novo prvenstvo začela z domačo zmago, tudi na prvem gostovanju v novi sezoni pa bo proti Radu odkrito napadala tri točke. Lahko domači presenetijo rdeče-bele in jim odščipnejo kakšno točko?(g)

programme.title: Live! Ruska liga: Spartak - Krasnodar
programme.desc: Ruska Premier liga je najmočnejše ligaško nogometno tekmovanje v Rusiji. Ustanovljena je bila leta 2001, namesto t.i. Višje divizije. V njej sodeluje 16 klubov. Na koncu sezone zadnja dva kluba izpadeta v t.i. Prvo divizijo. Ruska Premier liga zaradi neugodnih podnebnih razmer poteka od pomladi do jeseni(g)

programme.title: ATP 500 Hamburg: Vrhunci turnirja
programme.desc: Vsi vrhunci peščenega spektakla iz Hamburga zbrani na enem mestu(g)

programme.title: IAAF Athletix, 13. del
programme.desc: Najzanimivejša dogajanja znotraj atletski krogov, sveže informacije pred bližajočimi se mitingi in prvenstvi. Vse to in še veliko več vam ponuja oddaja IAAF Athletix(g)

programme.title: Live! ATP 500 Washington
programme.desc: S turnirjem v Washingtonu se začenja ameriška turneja, ki se bo končala z zadnjim letošnjim turnirjem za grand slam v New Yorku. ZMago brani Gael Monfils, ki bo imel vse prej kot lahko delo, če bo želel naslov ubraniti. Svoj prihod na turnir so ob Francozu napovedali tudi Dominic Thiem, Kei Nišikori, Miloš Raonič, Grigor Dimitrov in tudi številni ostali izjemni igralci, kar obeta nov teden tenisa za sladokusce(g)

programme.title: Avstrijska liga: Altach - Austria
programme.desc: Avstrijska Bundesliga je najvišje rangirano ligaško nogometno tekmovanje v Avstriji. Ustanovljena je bila daljnega leta 1911. V njej nastopa 10 klubov, ki med seboj odločajo o naslovu državnega prvaka. Daleč najuspešnejši klub je Rapid, ki je osvojil kar 32 naslovov, sledi mu Austria, ki jih je v svoje vitrine pospravila 24. Aktualni prvaki so nogometaši Salzburga

V leta 2004 ustanovljeni Super ligi se meri 16 moštev, aktualni prvaki prihajajo iz vrste Guangzhou Evergrande, ki so s šestimi naslovi hkrati tudi najuspešnejše moštvo(g)

programme.title: The Lindsey Way
programme.desc: Back in Iowa, David pursues a farm legend called Stricknine. Years of history and a giant rack make for a fun early-season chase. David takes advantage of biologic greens to capitalize on the giant Iowa 10-pointer

programme.title: Pigman: The Series
programme.desc: Pigman heads to Maynard Creek to hunt management deer and bring home a freezer full of meat. Naturally, hogs are also on the kill list

programme.title: Petersen's Hunting Adventures
programme.desc: At the end of a cold hard winter, Kali Parmley is looking forward to turkey season and a chance to take young Lauren on her first hunt, and then follow it up with her own opportunity to try out a new technique to bring a pair of gobblers into range

programme.title: McMillan
programme.desc: It's rifle season in Kansas, but Mr. Technology (Tom McMillan) is continuing his disastrous quest of being a self-taught cameraman

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: Jake is in Oregon with John Cole and Hunter's Rendezvous on the trail of a giant mule deer

programme.title: Trailing the Hunter's Moon
programme.desc: Oklahoma is a sleeper state when it comes to whitetails. Larry is hunting with Ryan Duncan, looking for a mature buck and hunting with his rattling forks

programme.title: Fresh Tracks With Randy Newberg
programme.sub-title: Silver State Muleys, Golden Memories - Part 2
programme.desc: Part 2. Randy and Matthew Newberg are joined by family friends, Mike Spitzer and Scott Jones, for a week in Nevada where they try to fill three tags on this late-season public land mule deer hunt

programme.title: Pigman: The Series
programme.desc: Pigman heads to Maynard Creek to hunt management deer and bring home a freezer full of meat. Naturally, hogs are also on the kill list

programme.title: Country Boys Outdoors
programme.desc: Brad has gathered his posse of Indiana buddies to travel to the Texas ranch that he considers a second home. With the rut in full swing, the boys are after the monster bucks that are known to inhabit this south Texas wonderland

programme.title: Whitetail Slam
programme.desc: Dr. James Kroll takes viewers into the land of the Dakota whitetail. These huge bucks of the upper Midwest and Canada are known as the biggest deer in North America

programme.title: McMillan
programme.desc: It's rifle season in Kansas, but Mr. Technology (Tom McMillan) is continuing his disastrous quest of being a self-taught cameraman

programme.title: Wild Outdoors
programme.desc: Jay Gregory heads to Wyoming and Montana to chase elk with Nelson Outfitters. Hunting only four days, he was able to harvest two incredible bulls

programme.title: RNT-V
programme.desc: While the mallard is still king On Arkansas's Grand Prairie, the specklebelly goose is gaining respect. Liberal limits and good numbers have increased hunter awareness to this often overlooked species of waterfowl

programme.title: Avian-X TV
programme.desc: Fred meets Brad Harris in Saskatoon. They travel to the oil fields of northern Saskatchewan in search of cooler temperatures and lesser Canada geese. With the wheat harvest in full swing, an abundance of fresh forage creates a waterfowl mecca

programme.title: The Honey Brake Experience
programme.desc: Big drake mallards are what drives Drew Keith

programme.title: Into High Country
programme.desc: Jason pursues his lifelong dream of traveling down to Argentina with good friends to bowhunt free-range red stag during the roar. Follow alongside Jason as he bowhunts the thick, thorn-covered landscape of Argentina in pursuit of a mature red stag bull

programme.title: Backwoods Life
programme.desc: Michael Lee, Kevin Knighton and Ryan & Kathy Whitaker have Kansas whitetail tags and are hoping to fill them at Royer Hunts

programme.title: The Lindsey Way
programme.desc: Back in Iowa, David pursues a farm legend called Stricknine. Years of history and a giant rack make for a fun early-season chase. David takes advantage of biologic greens to capitalize on the giant Iowa 10-pointer

programme.title: Gallery of Guns
programme.desc: Professional shooter Julie Golob fires rounds through the Smith & Wesson 586 Compact Magnum; Scott Kenneson from SIG shows us a conceal carry option with the P238 Spartan; and staff members show us the Diamondback DB10 & Glock 34 Gen 4

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.sub-title: Deer the Hard Way: Rogan & Callen On
programme.desc: Comedians Joe Rogan and Bryan Callen take a stab at their third species of North American deer as they join Steve on a blacktail hunt on Prince of Wales Island

programme.title: ConQuest 200 *
programme.desc: Doug Roberts takes his knee surgeon hunting at High Rack Ranch of Michigan. Doug Roberts decides to take the advice of his doctor and schedule surgery for his second knee replacement

programme.title: Full Draw Adventures *
programme.desc: Traveling to hunt the state of Kansas, Bill gets an important lesson on getting the most recent information. Meanwhile, Ricky is in Illinois where he has to make a difficult decision

programme.title: The Lindsey Way *
programme.desc: Jeff and family are in Pike County, Ill. after early-season whitetails. Jeff comes across a old bluff buck he wants to harvest, but not before his cameraman ruins the hunt after getting sick over some bad seafood nachos for lunch

programme.title: Dominant Bucks
programme.desc: Learn the Dominant Buck tactics of buck hunter Chad Rushing. Chad illustrates several unique methods he uses when hunting his home farm in Illinois

programme.title: Red Rising *
programme.desc: Jason Bowers is in Kansas with Dan Drake from Scentcrusher and Brian Smith. There are plenty deer in Kansas for everyone to get their chance at one

programme.title: The Hunt *
programme.desc: The rut is just getting cranked up in South Dakota, and Jake has his sights set on an ancient seven-point whitetail

programme.title: Buckventures' The Woodsman
programme.desc: Jeff Danker grinds it out for whitetail at Jackie Bushman's ranch in Montana

programme.title: McMillan *
programme.desc: Michael Waddell joins Tom McMillan in Oklahoma on a very unordinary hog hunt. Tom also ventures to southeastern Colorado to one of the most game rich areas he's ever hunted in

programme.title: Sweetwater
programme.desc: Joey shares his love of fishing with his young son and reminisces on how he learned to fish with his father

programme.title: In-Fisherman *
programme.sub-title: Beat Down on the Big Boys
programme.desc: The staff goes cruising for a bruising in battle mode for big fish as they crank up 10-pound largemouth bass, North America's all-time biggest pike and reveals the top two reservoirs right now for crappies

programme.title: The Western Hunter *
programme.desc: Nate and Randy return to one of their favorite elk hunting honeyholes in Idaho's backcountry. Nate regrets not having a deer tag and ends up alone, which makes filming a spot-and-stalk elk hunt a little tricky

programme.title: Pure Hunting
programme.desc: Willi Schmidt and Chris Nowak head to western Colorado for black bears. It took them three years to draw the tag in an area known to have quite a few bears

programme.title: Fresh Tracks With Randy Newberg *
programme.sub-title: Don't Shoot an Elk Here! - Colorado Elk Misery
programme.desc: Randy shows why you should not shoot an elk in some places they live. Toasty November temps have bulls in deep, dark canyons. Randy is dumb enough to shoot one down there and pays the price for doing so

programme.title: Petersen's Hunting Adventures
programme.desc: At the end of a cold hard winter, Kali Parmley is looking forward to turkey season and a chance to take young Lauren on her first hunt, and then follow it up with her own opportunity to try out a new technique to bring a pair of gobblers into range

programme.title: Long Range Pursuit
programme.sub-title: Sheep Hunting in the NWT With Mike and Aaron Pt 2
programme.desc: Conclusion. Sheep hunting in the Northwest Territories

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Steve shares a variety of recipes designed to jazz up your ground meat game

programme.title: Guns & Ammo TV *
programme.desc: Ruger has quickly moved to the forefront in suppressed rimfires with threaded barrel .22 firearms, its very own .22 suppressor and an integrated suppressed 10/22. Nikon has its first-ever laser rangefinger/binocular package

programme.title: GunVenture *
programme.desc: When faced with an attacker in her home, a young woman must defend herself with a handgun

programme.title: Small Town Hunting *
programme.desc: Kevin Meacham stays home at the office while the guys head to Texas to hunt the Harris Ranch in January for deer and again in March for gobbling Rios

programme.title: Adrenaline
programme.desc: Illinois resident Mack Raikes starts his bow season early as he journeys to Missouri for the September archery opener. First-time hunters Josh Athmer and Taigen Felker fill their youth season tags in their home state of Illinois

programme.title: Whitetail Slam *
programme.desc: Dr. James Kroll takes viewers into the Gulf Coast states to chase the toughest deer in North America. The Gulf Coast bucks rut from July until February and live in a hot, overgrown and swampy habitats

programme.title: Wildlifers *
programme.desc: The Wildlifers travel all the way to northern Australia in search of some trophies amongst the exploding population of water buffalo and encounter some rather scorching moments along the way

programme.title: Extreme Outer Limits TV *
programme.desc: Bob and Chris Beck hunt elk in the high country of Wyoming at Star Valley Outfitters

programme.title: Big Boys TV *
programme.desc: Part 1. It's Kevin and Jada's favorite time of year, the Michigan elk season is in full swing and Kevin goes on his once-in-a-lifetime elk hunt

programme.title: The Most Wanted List
programme.desc: In the treacherous mountains of New Zealand and Jessi Jo's red stag already checked off the list, Jess Smith has her sights set on tahr

programme.title: Winchester Deadly Passion
programme.desc: Melissa Bachman heads to Alaska with her dad in search of a big black bear with good friend Jason Boyer on Prince of Wales Island

programme.title: Beyond The Divide *
programme.sub-title: Wild Dogs of the Victorian High Country
programme.desc: Wild dogs are a serious issue for farmers. The damage through stock losses and lost productivity is huge. Rob teams up with a wild dog behavioral expert to hunt northeastern Victoria trying to call in these dangerous predators

programme.title: West of Texas
programme.desc: Hunting in the untouched wilderness of Canada's Northwest Territories, Stephen West and friend Gary Sitton are in a man-against-nature situation. The main focus of this hunt is a Dall sheep for Gary

programme.desc: Steve shares a variety of recipes designed to jazz up your ground meat game

programme.desc: Willi Schmidt and Chris Nowak head to western Colorado for black bears. It took them three years to draw the tag in an area known to have quite a few bears

programme.title: Into High Country
programme.desc: Jason joins his girlfriend, Cassandra Chwialkowski, in Argentina as she spot-and-stalks a mature axis buck with her bow. Follow along as she finally gets the shot shes been waiting for her whole life

programme.title: Sheep Shape *
programme.desc: Chad Hall takes on the frozen arctic in search of a mature muskox. Chad's friend, David, closes the distance on a muskox with his bow

programme.title: Long Range Pursuit
programme.sub-title: Sheep Hunting in the NWT With Mike and Aaron Pt 2
programme.desc: Conclusion. Sheep hunting in the Northwest Territories

programme.title: The Western Hunter
programme.desc: Nate and Randy return to one of their favorite elk hunting honeyholes in Idaho's backcountry. Nate regrets not having a deer tag and ends up alone, which makes filming a spot-and-stalk elk hunt a little tricky

programme.title: Pigman: The Series
programme.desc: Pigman heads to Maynard Creek to hunt management deer and bring home a freezer full of meat. Naturally, hogs are also on the kill list

programme.title: Relentless Pursuit *
programme.desc: Tim shows his tricks on luring coyotes within bow range. Tim then slocks the heads off his bearded prey with amazing shooting

programme.title: Hollywood Hunter *
programme.desc: We revisit Freddy's biggest elk kill on the ranch yet: Mr. Jumbo. But first, a very special in-remembrance hunt for the late Kurt Riser

programme.title: Trained Assassins
programme.desc: Blake Devall heads to their family farm in Illinois, while Jay Alston heads to his property in Missouri. Both guys have put in plenty of work in the off season to prepare for the bow season, let's see if it all pays off for these two

programme.title: Trailing the Hunter's Moon *
programme.desc: Larry Weishuhn is hunting whitetails in western Texas with Stephen Ray, who created rattling forks. The two are looking for a mature whitetail for Larry

programme.title: Bowlife
programme.desc: Part 2. Levi Morgan and ASA competitor, David Houser, head north to Nunavut, Canada to chase caribou

programme.title: Full Draw Adventures
programme.desc: Traveling to hunt the state of Kansas, Bill gets an important lesson on getting the most recent information. Meanwhile, Ricky is in Illinois where he has to make a difficult decision

programme.title: Whitetail Properties
programme.desc: The desire of land ownership starts with a passion for the wild, and progresses into passing along traditions. Dan Perez speaks volumes on the subject while enjoying another season

programme.title: Backwoods Life *
programme.desc: It seems that Kevin Knighton's whitetail nemesis is the state of Illinois. He's hunting with Chris Bishop at Buck Chasers to see if he can beat Illinois and tag a Pike County monster

programme.title: Out-There TV *
programme.desc: Corey heads to Illinois to chase giant whitetails with Midwest Bucks

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: The rut is just getting cranked up in South Dakota, and Jake has his sights set on an ancient seven-point whitetail

programme.title: Wildlifers
programme.desc: The Wildlifers travel all the way to northern Australia in search of some trophies amongst the exploding population of water buffalo and encounter some rather scorching moments along the way

programme.title: Sheep Shape

programme.title: Mighty Bite
programme.desc: Catching more and bigger fish with a Mighty Bite lure

programme.title: Big Boys TV

programme.title: Hornady's Dark & Dangerous *
programme.sub-title: Bullets and Bulls - Big and Small
programme.desc: Steve continues his safari with Harpreet as they collect several plains game species. Mark Vallaro and his client are well into the baiting game in Zimbabwe, while back in Mozambique, Bill Jones is concluding his safari with buffalo

programme.title: Moment of Impact *

programme.title: The Honey Brake Experience
programme.desc: Big drake mallards are what drives Drew Keith

programme.title: Mojo Outdoors TV *
programme.desc: Part 2. Terry Denmon heads to the waterfowl-friendly country of Argentina for a week of pure duck hunting paradise. Load'em up because the action never slows. Mojo's close friend, Ramsey Russell, joins in on the action

programme.title: Into the Blue
programme.desc: Bob Mahoney from Shimano joins Steve Rodger and Scott Walker in chasing bait sprays

programme.title: Saltwater Experience
programme.desc: Captain Tom Rowland and Captain Rich Tudor recall their favorite moments chasing redfish together

programme.title: Backwoods Life

programme.title: Handguns And Defensive Weapons *
